seo.description: Experience bold, flame-kissed flavors at Ember & Oak. Handcrafted dishes, premium ingredients, unforgettable dining.
seo.keywords: restaurant, fine dining, flame-grilled, steakhouse, best restaurant

hero.headline: Where Fire Meets Flavor
hero.subtext: Handcrafted dishes forged with passion, served with soul. Every bite tells a story of flame, smoke, and tradition.

about.headline: Our Story
about.text: Born from a passion for open-flame cooking and a reverence for honest ingredients, Ember & Oak has been the neighborhood's gathering place since 2015. Our chefs draw inspiration from global wood-fire traditions â€” from Argentine asado to Japanese robata â€” to create dishes that are both primal and refined.

reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.text: The smoked brisket literally melted in my mouth. Best dining experience in the city, hands down.

reviews.name: James R.
reviews.text: The ambiance is incredible â€” warm, intimate, and the open kitchen adds such energy. We'll be back every weekend.

reviews.name: Priya K.
reviews.text: As a vegetarian, I was blown away by the cauliflower steak. Creative, flavorful, and beautifully presented.

reviews.name: Michael T.
reviews.text: The Smoky Old Fashioned alone is worth the visit. Pair it with the burger and you're in heaven.

reviews.name: Lisa Chen
reviews.text: We hosted our anniversary dinner here. The staff made it magical. Every dish was a masterpiece.
